title: Complaint
body: I had a DirectX error and couldn't load onto the game and was forced afk and this only happened twice because I tested if I had fixed it and I guess I didn't but now I have to wait 10 minutes before each game.

replies.body: After updating your DirectX drivers, go ahead and run through the steps in this [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) as well. There are a few points in there that should be able to help smooth this out, but do make sure to test it in a custom/practice match after changing anything!
